docs.snippet: If anyone still doubted whether the Golden State Warriors were truly going to push for a record 73 wins instead of saving energy for the playoffs, that thought should now be put to rest for good....
docs.lead_paragraph: If anyone still doubted whether the Golden State Warriors were truly going to push for a record 73 wins instead of saving energy for the playoffs, that thought should now be put to rest for good.

docs.snippet: The Calgary Flames still haven't figured out how to beat the Anaheim Ducks on the road. Now they'll have at least six more months to think about ending one of the longest droughts in team sports....
